fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
ENCN holds the presidency of the Baltic Sea States Subregional Co-operation (BSSSC) for the period 2017-2018. BSSSC president is Mr. Roger Ryberg. Secretary General is Ms. Ann Irene Saeternes. 
  
Policy areas to be followed I 2017:  
Cohesion policy post 2020, Climate and Energy 2030, TEN-T Core Corridor Networks, Smart Specialisation, Urban Agenda, Education and Youth Policy, Circular Economy, Maritime policy - EU Strategy for the Baltic Sea Region and Sea Basin strategy in North Sea.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
membership:
The regions in Eastern Norway County Network are members of 
AER (Assembly of European Regions) 
BSSSC (Baltic Sea States Subregional Co-operation) 
NSC (North Sea Commission) 
CPMR (Conference of Peripheral and Maritime Regions) 
EuroCities 
Euromontana 
AEBR
goals__remit:
The overall aim of ENCN is to: 
 
•    Further develop Eastern Norway as a sustainable and competitive region in Europe. 
•    Secure a balanced and sustainable development within the region through polycentric development. This will help to ease the pressure on the capital region and strengthen the rest of the territory.  
 
Eastern Norway County Network has main focus on: 
•    Transport and communications 
•    Education, training and competence-building 
*      Economic Development and innovation 
•    European policy and cooperation
relevant_communication:
Presidency of BSSSC 2017-2018 - taking care of the interest for regions around the Baltic Sea towards national authorities and EU-institutions.  
 
Promotion of Interreg programme options toward Norwegian actors - Interreg BSR, Interreg NSR, Interreg Europe, Urbact, Horizon 2020, Erasmus+. Taking part in policy work of AER, CPMR, BSSSC, NSC, EuroCities, Euromontana and AEBR
